Message:
Nrgh, I’m following
the instructions properly,
so why isn’t anything going
the way it should be...?

I want to make bear earmuffs,
but they keep coming out
looking like brown snowmen...

But, I really want to give Sol
a proper present this year...

Maybe I should keep trying
just a little bit more...

In that moment,
I heard Mimi and Sophia
talking outside my room.

“Miss Sophia, why don’t you
make a paw-made gift
like everyone else?”

“I’m all thumbs, so I’m sure no one
would be pleased to receive
a poorly-made gift by me.

Something nice from a shop
would make them much happier.”

Even after their voices
faded into the distance,
Sophia’s words lingered
inside my head.

...No one would be pleased
to receive a poorly-made gift.
